body_html:
@alisidd I am a bit hesitant to say how tf treats tensors in the memory. I will let @AshishBora respond in this. But one clear advantage of a pseudo graph is that the network no longer needs to be fully connected. Also, a pseudo network with the non linearities removed may be a useful feature for other computations as well.

I have made some design updates, which I will push tonight.

body:
@alisidd I am a bit hesitant to say how tf treats tensors in the memory. I will let @AshishBora respond in this. But one clear advantage of a pseudo graph is that the network no longer needs to be fully connected. Also, a pseudo network with the non linearities removed may be a  useful feature for other computations as well.

I have made some design updates, which I will push tonight.
